lead_paragraph: Thanks to all who contributed thoughtful comments on online marketing in response to She Owns It's Trial and Error with AdWords and S.E.O. post. As a commenter named Martin Grief wrote, "Everyone has an opinion about AdWords, Facebook, Twitter, SEO." The dialogue was engrossing and -- more important -- useful to other business owners.
snippet: Readers comment on La Grande Dame's Internet marketing strategies.

headline.main: The Debate Over AdWords and S.E.O.

abstract: Readers comment on La Grande Dame's Internet marketing strategies.
